Title: Marble Madness
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: With the Gems tired of fighting waves of Peridot's robots, Steven comes up with a new, but dangerous plan to try and end it.
